title: Gottlieb's Sweet 16 matchup breakdowns; Cole Anthony's decision; Guest: Xavier HC Travis Steele
itunes:title: Gottlieb's Sweet 16 matchup breakdowns; Cole Anthony's decision; Guest: Xavier HC Travis Steele
description:
Subscribe here to the All Ball with Doug Gottlieb Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2.   This week, Gottlieb breaks down the NCAA Tournament Sweet 16 matchups, explains why Cole Anthony's college decision will impact next year's title contenders. Doug also talks hoops with Xavier Head Coach Travis Steele. Subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/all-ball-with-doug-gottlieb/id1358843497?mt=2. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
